mapper.select: select PR.REVIEW_NO as reviewno,PI.PATIENT_NAME as patientname, PA.APPLI_NO as applino,PA.PRODUCTS_NUM as productsnum, PI.INFOR_CLINICAL as inforclinical,PR.REVIEW_DATE as reportdate, PA.INSP_METHOD_LIST as inspmethodlist,PR.REVIEW_RESULT as reviewresult, PR.REVIEW_DOCTOR_ID as reviewdoctorid,PR.CONSULTATION_IF as consultationif, PR.DIAGNOSIS_STATUS as diagnosisstatus from eq_pathology_review PR left join eq_patient_appli PA on PR.APPLI_NO = PA.APPLI_NO left join eq_patient_info PI on PI.PATIENT_NO = PA.PATIENT_NO

select PI.PATIENT_AGE as patientage,PI.PATIENT_NAME as patientname, PA.PATIENT_DIAG_KIND as patientdiagkind,PA.APPLI_NO as applino, PR.REVIEW_DATE as reviewdate,PR.PRINT_DATE as printdate, ST.STAFF_NAME as reviewdoctorid from eq_pathology_review PR left join eq_patient_appli PA on PR.APPLI_NO = PA.APPLI_NO left join eq_patient_info PI on PI.PATIENT_NO = PA.PATIENT_NO left join eq_staff ST on ST.STAFF_ID = PR.REVIEW_DOCTOR_ID

select PI.PATIENT_AGE as patientage,PI.PATIENT_NAME as patientname, PA.PATIENT_DIAG_KIND as patientdiagkind,PA.APPLI_NO as applino, PR.REVIEW_DATE as reviewdate,PR.PRINT_DATE as printdate, ST.STAFF_NAME as reviewdoctorid from eq_pathology_review PR left join eq_patient_appli PA on PR.APPLI_NO = PA.APPLI_NO left join eq_patient_info PI on PI.PATIENT_NO = PA.PATIENT_NO left join eq_staff ST on ST.STAFF_ID = PR.REVIEW_DOCTOR_ID
PR.REVIEW_STATUS=#{reviewstatus} and PA.PATIENT_DIAG_KIND=#{patientdiagkind} or PI.PATIENT_NAME=#{patientname} or PA.APPLI_NO=#{applino,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and date(PR.REVIEW_DATE) >= date(#{reviewdate001,jdbcType=DATE})
and date(PR.REVIEW_DATE) <= date(#{reviewdate002,jdbcType=DATE})
